long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Giving Tab is a todo-list extension for Chrome which donates all generated income to help the victims of earthquake in Nepal. 

Add Giving Tab to your browser today, and every time you open a new tab, a little bit of income would be generated which would be then donated to charities which are working in the affected regionsâ€“ AT NO COST TO YOU!

FEATURES- 
ADD new task
DELETE tasks
GROUP tasks
MAINTAIN task status as per progress

No personal data or browser history is collected/stored/sent to us.
